tool_description: This API provides data for more than 73000 Airports and Heliports including geolocation, frequencies, runways and navaids.
title: Airport

api_list.name: Get Navaids by ICAO
api_list.description: Search through our navaids database, by entering the ICAO code (4 letters) of the airport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airport10.p.rapidapi.com/navaids/{icao}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airport10.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Region by code
api_list.description: Get a region by entering the region iso code specified in the airport property regionIso.
api_list.code:

}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Airport by Name
api_list.description: Search through our database of more than 73000 airports/heliports, by entering the name of the airport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airport10.p.rapidapi.com/airports/name/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airport10.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
